about_the_game:
Welcome to the little city of Flyport, Missouri




Local reporter Alex receives a letter from his missing father, which contains warnings and instructions on how to escape from the impending catastrophe. Together with their friends, they go to a strange warehouse outside the city, where they will see and take part in something that will change their future forever.



Working as a little robber, Steve arrives on another assignment where he needs to find old blueprints in an abandoned archive on the edge of town. This place has not been visited for a long time, but the mysterious events that took place in this place still remind of themselves being transmitted between the residents of the city. Referring to the urban legend, the guy sneaks into the building without fear and faces what he could not imagine even in the most terrible nightmares.



This demo featured some game mechanics, a small part of the story, and some levels from the upcoming full version. The game provides 3 levels in which you will have to explore different locations, as well as get to know the three main characters. Go to three different situations, in three different locations, to complete three different tasks!



Welcome to Freddy's Archives, the place that will destroy any memory of you!

name: Freddy's Archives: Remains Of The Past Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Explore mysteries and riddles, a place where many people have gone missing. A place that won't let you forget, a place that will be the beginning of the end, a place where you were sent to find answers!
